channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse IDE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse IDE

item.title: CVE-2023-4218|2024-09-03T19:26:14.225Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- eclipse%20ide
item.description: In Eclipse IDE versions < 2023-09 (4.29) some files with xml content are parsed vulnerable against all sorts of XXE attacks. The user just needs to open any evil project or update an open project with a vulnerable file (for example for review a foreign repository or patch).
